raw_comment: I notice that the Major Baseball League has the least players of color and that both basketball associations have the greatest amount of players of color. I wonder if there are other sports that also have colored players and coaches. This impacts my community because there has been situations where people of color are treated differently than others. These graphs show that more than half of the leagues people are people of color and this shows that no matter what skin color you have. How diverse are these sports?
ace_sentences: I notice that Major League Baseball has the fewest players of color.
I notice that both basketball associations have the most players of color.
I wonder if other sports also have players of color.
I wonder if other sports also have coaches of color.
In my community, there have been situations.
In these situations, people of color are treated differently than other people.
These graphs show that more than half of the players in the leagues are people of color.
This shows that a person can play in these leagues no matter what skin color the person has.
I ask how diverse these sports are.
